Articles.Content: In 1.12, I've noticed that when I switch to vehicles from the map view, the vehicle is surrounded briefly with a yellow aura. Is there some significance to it? I imagine if there were several vehicles in very close proximity it would help to identify which specific vehicle was the focus, but it seems unnecessary.
I have never seen anything like it. Can you take a screenshot or video of the effect?

4 hours ago, Streetwind said:

I have never seen anything like it. Can you take a screenshot or video of the effect?

I'll give it a try, though it may be a day or two before I get to it ... I'm still learning how to do in-game videos.
Also, do you have any mods installed? Although I haven't used 1.12 much, I know there's a mod (Easy Vessel Switch) that gives the yellow glow.
